common.title: Fury Racing
common.description: Onchain racing manager leveraging Chainlink VRF V2.5 and Chainlink Functions.

description.solo: Play a quick solo race against an AI. No entry fee. No waiting. No pressure.
description.free: Play a 1v1 race against against another player. No entry fee.
description.tournament: Double or nothing: Pay the entry fee and play to double up your bet against another player! Climb up the rank in the leaderboard and try to grab the weekly prize pool!

mode.note: * 5% of the entry fees collected are going to the weekly prize pool. The rest goes to the winner of the race.

attributesDescription.reliability: Increase the car's reliability and reduce the chance of a breakdown.
attributesDescription.maniability: Increase the car's ability to turn and corner at high speeds.
attributesDescription.speed: Increase the car's top speed and acceleration.
attributesDescription.breaks: Increase the car's braking power and reduce the stopping distance.
attributesDescription.car_balance: Increase the car's stability and reduce the chance of spinning out.
attributesDescription.aerodynamics: Increase the car's downforce and reduce the chance of losing grip.
attributesDescription.driver_skills: Increase the driver's skill and reduce the chance of making mistakes.
attributesDescription.luck: Increase your luck to boost all your car's attributes by a small percentage. But decrease it too much and the opposite will happen!

cars.car_1: A reliable car with good balance and breaks.
cars.car_2: A car with high maniability and aerodynamics.
cars.car_3: A fast car with moderate breaks and balance.
